name: Incline Push-Ups
descriptions: A beginner-friendly push-up variation that targets the chest with reduced resistance.
steps: Place hands on elevated surface, shoulder-width apart.
Extend legs backward keeping body in a straight line.
Lower chest slowly toward the surface.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: Overhead Squat
descriptions: A full-body squat performed while holding a barbell overhead, improving strength, stability, and mobility.
steps: Stand with barbell overhead, arms locked out.
Keep chest up and core tight.
Squat down slowly while keeping bar stable.
Drive through heels to return to standing.

name: Seated Barbell Shoulder Press
descriptions: An upper-body strength exercise where the lifter presses a barbell overhead while seated, targeting the shoulders and triceps.
steps: Sit on a bench with back support.
Hold barbell at shoulder height with a firm grip.
Press the bar upward until arms are straight.
Lower slowly back to shoulder height.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
descriptions: A classic arm exercise where you lift dumbbells by bending your elbows, isolating and building the biceps.
steps: Hold dumbbells by your sides with palms facing forward.
Keep elbows close to your torso.
Curl weights up while contracting biceps.
Lower slowly back down.

name: Plank
descriptions: A core strengthening isometric exercise where you hold your body in a straight line, engaging the abs, back, and shoulders.
steps: Place forearms on the floor and extend legs back.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Engage your core and avoid arching your back.
Hold the position for the desired duration.
